Had the work in Africa been carried forward as it should have been, the present war would not have been as it now is. The presentation of Bible truth, accompanied by the medical missionary work, would have found favour with the people who if properly treated are not treacherous and cruel. The truth received 
57
by them would have worked changes more decided than have been revealed in a so-called Christian nation that have had the gospel preached to them \97Ms 178, 1899.
